shieldSetupOnboarding_introStep_subtitle: Create your Security Shield by combining different security factors. Use it to safely sign transactions and recover Accounts if youâ€™ve lost access.
shieldSetupOnboarding_buildShieldStep_ti: Add your security factors and build your Shield
shieldSetupOnboarding_buildShieldStep_su: Add your security factors to your Radix Wallet and use them to build your Shield.
shieldSetupOnboarding_applyShieldStep_ti: Apply your Shield to your Accounts and Personas
shieldSetupOnboarding_applyShieldStep_su:
Sign a transaction to apply your Shield to your Account or Persona.

You can use the same Shield for your Accounts and Personas or create multiple Shields.
